channel.title: This guy is dropped by Fox
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fOaCemmsnNk
I think it might have something to do with this...

item.title: This guy is dropped by Fox
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:7, topic:432794”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=535503.msg3915309#msg3915309 date=1329100813]

Just saw the article. That sucks. He was one of the only people on TV that actually explained it how it was. Fuck you Glenn Beck.

Becks been gone from fox from awhile, but yes your right, I wish I would have got to listen to more of this guy before he got dropped. Its pretty sad that they dropped him his show was great, there no news media left to be taken for truth
[/quote]Media should never be assumed to be the truth, regardless of your own politicial views, or what station it is. The only way to be certain of facts is to do your own research.[/quote]

Beginning to see thats more and more true everyday.

Read full topic
item.source: This guy is dropped by Fox

item.title: This guy is dropped by Fox
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Pwnd:

HE ACTUALLY GOT DROPPED?

WND

Fox drops Judge Napolitano show

WASHINGTON – Judge Andrew Napolitano’s “Freedom Watch” on Fox Business Channel, arguably the most hard-hitting conservative show on TV, is being dropped by the network later this month in a major shakeup of the lineup. FBC is also dropping shows by...
